        Parameters:
        index - the index of the array of EditArea objects

      • changeWordWrap

        public void changeWordWrap(boolean isWordWrap)
        Enables/disables wordwrap in the EditArea whose index is currently set

        Parameters:
        isWordWrap - true to enable wordwrap, if false line numbers are shown depending on the entry in prefs

      • isConsoleSelected

        If the console panel is shown

      • enableProjActions

        public void enableProjActions(boolean isCompile,
                              boolean isRun,
                              boolean isBuild,
                              int projCount)
        Enables/disables menu items and toolbar buttons for to project actions
        Parameters:
        isCompile - true/false to enable/disable the compilation action
        isRun - true/false to enable/disable the run action
        isBuild - true/false to enable/disable the build action
        projCount - the number of loaded projects. If 1 the action to show the fileview is enabled, if 2 the action to change between projects is enabled

      • enableChangeProjItm

        public void enableChangeProjItm()
        Enabled the menu item to change between projects

      • setBusyCursor

        public void setBusyCursor(boolean isBusy)
        Sets busy or default curser
        Parameters:
        isBusy - true to set a busy curor, false to set the default cursor

      • showProjectInfo

        public void showProjectInfo(java.lang.String name)
        Displays the project name in the status bar
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the project
